Description:
Collecting, receiving, labeling, and/or analyzing samples or substances using the correct testing equipment, when necessary.
Collect and assess incoming samples through proper methods as per requirement.
Assuring the safety of laboratory and relevant items by understanding all the safety guidelines.
Carrying efficient record-keeping tasks for maintaining all the information accurately.Skills
Skills:
Adept in using hazardous laboratory materials by adhering to safety norms and standards.
Hands-on expertise in handling all types of laboratory equipment.
Detailed knowledge of managerial systems and best practices pertaining to laboratories.
